title: dangelxp
author: dangelxp
content: Ever wanted to be famous and noticed in comments? fear no more, katana is offering a youtube verification service  CoolUsually you'd need 100k subscribers in order to get it, however I can get ANY channel verified no matter what the sub count is.Viewer access is needed to complete this process.Timeframe:Timeframe is usually under 1-24 hours in most cases, but 48 hours max to be safe. this makes this service one of the fastest.Why Verify a YouTube channel:YouTube verification is perfect for any content creator, brand or company.  Helps with channel growth, algorithm boost and gets boosted in comments section, making your comment more likely to be first.Gray check mark, incase you wanna look professional or just flex  CoolProcess:Done through our connections directly through a YouTube employee with a very high success chance.Pricing: 1850$ *NON NEGOTIABLE DONT WASTE MY TIME*Perks:- Assistance in Verification on other Social Media- Notability- Social Proof

comments.author: powtoon
comments.body: I found a website providing Youtube verification service, https://socialslash.com/youtube-verification/ they saying full refund if not success to verify, if anyone use this website service share your experience.
